Approvable Interface Reference

Defines methods that are useful for objects that can be approved (e.g. user comments). More...

 Finds all elements whose approved status is false.

 Finds all elements whose approved status is true.

Detailed Description

Defines methods that are useful for objects that can be approved (e.g. user comments).
